responseTime.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
responseTime.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days (Monday-Friday). For urgent technical issues, our support team is available via email and phone.

technicalSupport.question: I'm having technical issues with the platform. How can I get help?
technicalSupport.answer: For technical support, please email support@lusitanestate.pt with a detailed description of the issue, including screenshots if possible. Our technical team will prioritize your request.

pricing.question: Where can I find information about pricing and plans?
pricing.answer: Visit our Pricing page for detailed information about all available plans, features, and pricing. For enterprise solutions, contact our sales team directly.

dataRights.question: How can I exercise my data protection rights?
dataRights.answer: To exercise your rights under GDPR (access, rectification, deletion, etc.), please contact our Data Protection Officer at dpo@lusitanestate.pt. We'll respond within 30 days.

hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: The leading platform for the Portuguese real estate market, connecting buyers, sellers, and industry professionals.

mission.title: Simplifying the journey to find your
mission.description1: To simplify and modernize the process of buying, selling, and renting properties in Portugal. We believe that finding the perfect home should be a transparent, efficient, and accessible experience for everyone.
mission.description2: We've developed a platform that combines cutting-edge technology with deep knowledge of the Portuguese real estate market, offering tools that empower both individuals and industry professionals.

values.title: Guiding Principles
values.subtitle: Principles that guide every decision and interaction on our platform.

security.title: Security and Privacy
security.description: We protect your data with the highest security standards, in full compliance with GDPR and Portuguese legislation.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We verify all listings and promote ethical practices, ensuring a fair experience for all users.

continuousInnovation.title: Continuous Innovation
continuousInnovation.description: We constantly invest in new features and technologies to improve our users' experience.

services.title: What We Offer
services.subtitle: Complete solutions for all real estate market needs.

buyers.title: For Buyers
buyers.description: Search thousands of properties with advanced filters. Save favorites, receive alerts, and contact advertisers directly.

sellers.title: For Sellers
sellers.description: Publish listings with unlimited photos, detailed descriptions, and reach thousands of potential buyers.

forAgents.title: For Agents
forAgents.description: Professional tools for portfolio management, integrated CRM, and increased visibility for your listings.

agencies.title: For Agencies
agencies.description: Business solutions with team management, analytical reports, and custom integrations.

coverage.title: National Coverage
coverage.subtitle: Present in all 18 districts of mainland Portugal and autonomous regions.
coverage.autonomousRegions: Including the Autonomous Regions of Madeira and Azores

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and plans
faq.question1: Can I change plans at any time?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for our Basic and Professional plans. No credit card required.
faq.question3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer3: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for Enterprise plans.
faq.answer4: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
faq.answer5: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
faq.answer6: No, there are no setup fees or hidden charges. The price you see is the price you pay.
faq.question7: What happens to my listings if I downgrade?
faq.answer7: Your existing listings will remain active. However, you won't be able to add new listings beyond your plan's limit.
faq.question8: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
faq.answer8: Yes, you save 20% when you choose annual billing instead of monthly.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of successful property buyers, sellers, and agents on LusitanEstate.
cta.teamAvailable: Our team is available to help you choose the right plan

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: Try any paid plan risk-free. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll refund your money.

contact.title: Need a custom solution?
contact.description: Contact our sales team to discuss enterprise options and custom pricing.

header.title: Terms of Service
header.intro: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform. By accessing or using LusitanEstate, you agree to be bound by these terms.

section1.title: 1. Definitions
section1.user: "User": Any person or entity accessing our services
section1.services: "Services": All features and functionalities provided by LusitanEstate
section1.content: "Content": Property listings, images, descriptions, and user-generated data
section1.account: "Account": User registration profile and associated data

section2.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
section2.paragraph1: By accessing and using LusitanEstate, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
section2.paragraph2: If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.
section2.paragraph3: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.

section3.title: 3. User Accounts
section3.paragraph1: To access certain features, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration.
section3.buyer: Buyer: Individuals searching for properties to purchase or rent
section3.seller: Seller: Property owners listing properties for sale or rent
section3.agent: Agent: Licensed real estate professionals representing clients
section3.agency: Agency: Real estate companies managing multiple agents and listings
section3.paragraph2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access.

section4.title: 4. User Conduct and Obligations
section4.intro1: When using our platform, you agree to:
section4.requirement1: Provide accurate and truthful information in all listings and communications
section4.requirement2: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
section4.requirement3: Respect the intellectual property rights of others
section4.requirement4: Use the platform only for lawful real estate transactions
section4.requirement5: Maintain professional and respectful communication with other users
section4.prohibited1: Post false, misleading, or fraudulent property listings
section4.prohibited3: Transmit spam, unsolicited advertisements, or bulk communications
section4.prohibited4: Use automated systems or bots to access the platform
section4.prohibited5: Interfere with or disrupt the platform's functionality or security
section4.paragraph1: Violation of these terms may result in account suspension or termination, removal of content, and legal action if necessary.

section5.title: 5. Property Listings
section5.paragraph1: All property listings must contain accurate, complete, and up-to-date information. Sellers and agents are responsible for the accuracy of their listings.
section5.paragraph2: Photos must be of the actual property and accurately represent its current condition. Misleading images are prohibited.
section5.paragraph3: Listings must be removed or marked as unavailable within 24 hours of sale, rental, or withdrawal from market. We reserve the right to remove listings that violate our policies.

section6.title: 6. Payments and Fees
section6.paragraph1: Certain features and services require payment of fees as outlined in our Pricing page. All fees are stated in Euros (€) unless otherwise specified.
section6.paragraph2: Fees are non-refundable except as required by law or as explicitly stated in our refund policy. We reserve the right to change fees with 30 days advance notice.
section6.paragraph3: LusitanEstate is not a party to any transactions between buyers, sellers, and agents. We do not handle property transactions or payments for properties.

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.paragraph1: All content on LusitanEstate, including logos, text, graphics, software, and design elements, is owned by LusitanEstate or its licensors and is protected by Portuguese and international copyright and trademark laws. User-generated content remains the property of users, but you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use, display, and distribute your content on our platform.

section8.title: 8. Privacy and Data Protection
section8.paragraph1: We collect and process personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Portuguese data protection laws.
section8.paragraph2: Your data is used to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
section8.paragraph3: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, and port your personal data. Contact our Data Protection Officer at dpo@lusitanestate.pt to exercise these rights.

section9.title: 9. Disclaimers and Limitations of Liability
section9.paragraph1: LusitanEstate is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any property listings or user content.
section9.paragraph2: We are not responsible for the conduct of users, the quality of properties, or the outcome of transactions. Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by Portuguese law.

section10.title: 10. Dispute Resolution
section10.paragraph1: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Portugal. Any disputes shall be resolved in Portuguese courts.
section10.paragraph2: For consumer disputes, you may use the Portuguese Consumer Dispute Portal (www.consumidor.pt) or the European ODR Platform (ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr).
section10.paragraph3: Any claims must be filed within one year of the event giving rise to the claim, except where prohibited by law.

section11.title: 11. Contact Information
section11.intro: For questions, concerns, or notices regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At LusitanEstate, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

section1.title: 1. Data Controller
section1.intro: The data controller responsible for your personal information is:
section1.contact: For any questions about your data, please visit our

collection.title: 2. Data We Collect
collection.description: We collect the following categories of information:

items.item1: Name, email address, and phone number when you create an account
items.item3: Profile information and photos you choose to upload
items.item4: Property listings, descriptions, and photos you submit
items.item5: Payment and billing information for paid services
items.item6: Communications with us or other users through the platform

items.item1: IP address, device type, and unique device identifiers
items.item2: Browser type, version, and language preferences
items.item3: Pages visited, time spent, and navigation patterns
items.item4: Search queries, filters, and property views
items.item5: Cookies and similar tracking technologies (see Cookie Policy)

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
usage.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

purposes.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our real estate platform services
purposes.item2: Process transactions, send confirmations, and service notifications
purposes.item3: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
purposes.item4: Send marketing communications and property alerts (with your consent)
purposes.item5: Detect, prevent, and address fraud, security issues, and abuse
purposes.item6: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service
purposes.item7: Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience and platform features
purposes.item8: Personalize content, recommendations, and search results

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.description: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

parties.item1: With other users (agents, buyers, sellers) to facilitate property transactions
parties.item2: With service providers who assist with platform operations (hosting, analytics, email)
parties.item3: With payment processors to handle billing and subscription management
parties.item4: With analytics and advertising partners to improve our services
parties.item5: With legal authorities when required by law or to protect our rights
parties.item6: In connection with a business transfer, merger, or acquisition

sharing.note: We do not sell your personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze platform usage. You can control cookies through your browser settings. For detailed information, please see our Cookie Policy.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard technical and organizational security measures to protect your information, including encryption, firewalls, and secure servers. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security of your data.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.description: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

access.title: Right of Access
access.description: Request a copy of your personal data we hold

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: Request deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten')

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.description: Limit how we process your data

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: Object to processing based on legitimate interests

rights.exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us at privacidade@realestate-pt.com or through our contact page.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your information within 90 days, except where we are legally required to retain certain data (e.g., for tax or legal purposes).

transfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
transfers.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of Portugal and the European Union. We ensure that such transfers comply with GDPR through appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses and adequacy decisions.

minors.title: 10. Children's Privacy
minors.content: Our service is not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately so we can delete it.

changes.title: 11. Policy Updates
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of material changes via email or a prominent notice on our platform. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

header.title: Cookie Policy
header.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how LusitanEstate uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our platform. We explain what these technologies are, why we use them, and your rights to control their use.

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.intro: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide a better user experience.
section1.types: Cookies can be classified by duration:
section1.session: Session Cookies: Temporary cookies deleted when you close your browser
section1.persistent: Persistent Cookies: Remain on your device for a set period or until manually deleted
section1.classification: They can also be classified by origin:
section1.firstParty: First-Party Cookies: Set by the website you're visiting (LusitanEstate)
section1.thirdParty: Third-Party Cookies: Set by external services integrated into our platform

section2.title: 2. Legal Basis for Using Cookies
section2.intro: Our use of cookies is based on Portuguese and European Union legislation, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the ePrivacy Directive.
section2.legislation: Under this legislation, cookies are classified into two categories:
section2.essential: Essential Cookies: Strictly necessary for the platform to function. These do not require consent as they are essential for providing the service you requested.
section2.nonEssential: Non-Essential Cookies: All other cookies (functional, analytics, marketing) require your explicit consent before being placed on your device.
section2.consent: When you first visit our platform, you'll see a cookie banner allowing you to accept or reject non-essential cookies. You can change your preferences at any time.
section2.note: Note: Blocking certain cookies may affect platform functionality and user experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are strictly necessary for the platform to function. They enable core features such as authentication, security, session management, and load balancing. Without these cookies, our services cannot be provided.
essential.authToken: Manages user authentication and login sessions
essential.sessionId: Maintains your session while navigating the platform
essential.csrfToken: Protects against cross-site request forgery attacks

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization. They remember your choices (such as language preference) and provide improved, personalized features.
functional.userPreferences: Stores language, region, and display preferences

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our platform by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our services.
analytics.ga: Google Analytics - main cookie for user identification
analytics.gaSession: Google Analytics - session and campaign tracking

marketing.title: Marketing/Advertising Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies track visitors across websites to display relevant, personalized advertisements and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
marketing.fbp: Facebook Pixel - tracks conversions and builds audiences
marketing.adsPrefs: Stores advertising preferences and targeting information

section4.title: 4. Managing Your Cookie Preferences
section4.banner: When you first visit our platform, you'll see a cookie consent banner. You can choose to accept all cookies, reject non-essential cookies, or customize your preferences by cookie category.
section4.changePreferences: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the 'Cookie Settings' link in our website footer or by clearing cookies through your browser settings.
section4.browserSettings: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can typically find these in the 'Options' or 'Preferences' menu. Links to cookie management guides for popular browsers:
section4.warning: Important: Disabling cookies may impact your ability to use certain features of our platform. Essential cookies cannot be disabled as they are necessary for the platform to function.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies and Services
section5.intro: We use third-party services that may place cookies on your device. These services have their own privacy policies and cookie policies:
section5.optOut: To opt out of interest-based advertising from participating companies, you can use these tools:

section6.title: 6. Other Tracking Technologies
section6.intro: In addition to cookies, we use other similar tracking technologies:
section6.localStorage: Local Storage: HTML5 local storage for storing preferences and cached data locally in your browser
section6.sessionStorage: Session Storage: Temporary storage that is cleared when you close your browser
section6.pixels: Pixels/Web Beacons: Small invisible images used to track page views and user behavior
section6.consent: Your cookie consent preferences also apply to these similar technologies.

section7.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
section7.paragraph1: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our cookie usage, technology, or legal requirements. The 'Last Updated' date at the top of this page indicates when the policy was last revised.
section7.paragraph2: We encourage you to review this Cookie Policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies. Material changes will be communicated via email or a prominent notice on our platform.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.intro: If you have questions or concerns about our use of cookies, please contact us:
